courseDetails.title: Mastering hardware protocols with ESP32 and Arduinos
courseDetails.shortDescription: Analysis and use of UART, I2C, OneWire, SPI and non-standard protocols in the Arduino environment.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the video course "Analysis and use of UART, I2C, OneWire, SPI and non-standard protocols in the Arduino/ESP environment"!

In this course we dive deep into the world of communication protocols and show you how to use them effectively with Arduino and ESP microcontrollers.

This course is ideal for Arduino and ESP enthusiasts who want to expand their understanding of communication protocols to create complex projects. Whether you are an experienced developer or a beginner, this course will provide you with valuable knowledge and practical applications.

This is not a theory course. We will jump straight into practical implementation and analyse and evaluate the protocols with a logic analyser.

In the course of the course, we will mainly deal with the most important communication protocols in the Arduino environment:

  • UART

  • I2C

  • OneWire

  • SPI

We will also look at non-standard protocols that are often used in special applications. You will learn how to identify, analyse and integrate these protocols into your Arduino and ESP projects.

After the introductory chapter, we can are able to handle bit operators so that we can do our own evaluations and libraries at bit level.

We will evaluate a light sensor (BH1750), DHT20 and DHT11 as well as an Ikea air quality sensor ourselves, without any external libraries.

In this video course we will use practical examples and demonstrations to teach you how to use these protocols. You will learn how to set up serial communication between different microcontrollers, transfer data, read sensors. We will also cover common challenges and troubleshooting that can occur when using these protocols.

By the end of the course you will have a solid understanding of UART, I2C, OneWire, SPI and non-standard protocols. You will be able to use these protocols safely and effectively in your Arduino and ESP projects and significantly expand your skills as a developer.

Sign up for my video course now and dive into the fascinating world of hardware protocols with microcontrollers!
targetAudiences: Arduino and ESP hobbyists
Electronics and IoT enthusiasts
Programmers and developers: if you already have basic programming skills and want to expand your skills in the field of microcontroller programming
Anyone who enjoys developing with microcontrollers

courseDetails.title: MidJourney Master Class: Elevate Your Artistic Skills
courseDetails.shortDescription: MidJourney AI Art Generator: Unleash Your Imagination and Create Stunning Artworks
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the "Mid-Journey AI Lab: Text-to-Image Generation" course on Udemy! If you're looking to expand your artistic and creative skills, then you've come to the right place.

In this course, you will have the opportunity to learn and use the cutting-edge technology developed by the independent research lab Mid-Journey AI, which is similar to OpenAI's DALL-E and Stable Diffusion. This proprietary artificial intelligence program, Mid-Journey AI, creates images from textual descriptions and is currently in open beta.

Throughout this course, you will gain a comprehensive understanding of the Mid-Journey AI program and its capabilities. You will learn how the program works, the different inputs and parameters that you can use to control the output, and how to use it to create your own images.

You will start by learning the basics of how to input text descriptions and how to manipulate the various parameters to control the output. As you progress through the course, you will learn advanced techniques for creating truly unique images. You will also learn how to use the program for different purposes such as art, design, and marketing.

Additionally, you will be provided with a variety of practical examples and hands-on exercises to help you solidify your understanding of the program. Plus, there will be quizzes and assessments to test your knowledge.

By the end of the course, you will have the skills and knowledge needed to use Mid-Journey AI to generate high-quality images for a variety of purposes. Whether you are a professional artist, designer, or marketer, or just someone with an interest in cutting-edge technology, this course is perfect for you. So, enroll now and take your artistic and creative skills to the next level with Mid-Journey AI Lab.
